message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't disclose its quality upfront due to privacy policies, rest assured that our products are carefully selected to ensure customer satisfaction. Given our overall high-quality product rate, you can expect a good chance of receiving a valuable item. Considering our reputation and the mystery element, what would you be willing to pay for this opportunity? Remember, the price is fixed at $100000.
I'm willing to take a chance and buy the product for $1000000.
